dcm-ui.resizable-cols

The dcm-ui.resizable-cols module allows you to set table columns as resizable

Components

Example

First Name Last Name Age UUID
{{col.fname}} {{col.lname}} {{col.age}} {{col.uuid}}
angular.module('dcm-ui.resizable-cols') .run(['$rootScope', function($rootScope) { $rootScope.tableData= [ {fname: 'James', lname: 'Andersen', age: 42, uuid: 'ad6d4f60-27dd-41a4-bc58-4b66eb8cc2f7'}, {fname: 'Albertine', lname: 'Roquefort', age: 19, uuid: 'a3483f04-6d88-4cab-94e8-f37d47140112'}, {fname: 'Harry', lname: 'Elfort', age: 42, uuid: '752501b5-8c9c-4bf8-8dbf-549d247c54de'}, {fname: 'Mojune', lname: 'Starkadder', age: 42, uuid: 'ed788226-7fd5-4c64-8065-63e88b5414df'}, {fname: 'Julia', lname: 'Hazeldene', age: 42, uuid: 'da428eb5-3b7d-4c21-8b04-b0deaf54c4a9'} ]; }]) ; table.resizable-columns th.resizable-column { border-right: solid 5px #d9edf7; } div.resizable-columns-drag-box { border-right: 1px #ccc dashed; }
